programme.title: Return Match
programme.desc: Nkisi and her brother frustrates the entire compound, but everything is about to change as Panguru steps into the compound with his son to distort their plans.

programme.title: Ungrateful Brother
programme.desc: Ikeoku kills his brother because of his wealth, but everything turns bad when everything he did bounce back and ruins his own family.

programme.title: Temple Run
programme.desc: Ukeje and his daughter Nsogbu are once a shadow over the community. Their thievery is a constant blight, leaving a trail of empty pockets and violated trust.

programme.title: The Sadist
programme.desc: Ekweme, once at rock bottom, finds hope in the arrival of nurses to his compound. Their presence sparks a series of events that leads him on a path to redemption and renewal.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: Path Of Honour
programme.desc: Chief Ozor does everything in his power to bring down his boy Pakadidi, who abandoned him, his resolve intensifying after Pakadidi accidentally takes the life of his only child.

programme.title: Prince Arthur
programme.desc: Prince Arthur marries three women and they all died simultaneously, the killer did this because she believes he killed her sister. Will this killing spree stop?

programme.title: Wife On Highway
programme.desc: Cornelius, a notorious womanizer remains close friends with ND, causing NDs fiancee, Olive, to leave him for refusing to cut ties.

programme.title: Ozioma The Slave Girl
programme.desc: When a ruthless slave master raids Oziomas land, Chibuike defies his own father to fight for the captives freedom. His love for Ozioma drives him into a deadly clash.

programme.title: Perfect Half
programme.desc: Jeff falls in love with his mothers best friend while she is working with her, but this story eventually turns because Jeff and Joy can never have a relationship.

programme.title: Domestic Spies
programme.desc: Paulinus and Olivia, domestic spies hired by a couple to monitor each other unexpectedly fall in love. Together, they endeavor to rekindle the couples love.

programme.title: My Wife My Angel
programme.desc: Nnadozie marries the best woman for him but his lifestyle will not make him see it. H sells his love away to get rich and couldnt keep the wealth.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: If Tomorrow Comes
programme.desc: Merits cancer diagnosis leads Nneka to urge her boyfriend to date her with the intention of exploiting her before her death. However, the scheme backfires.

programme.title: Made For Me
programme.desc: Wilson and his wife finds themselves in a busy war when his wife has no time for their relationship, so his mother in-law devise a means to save her daughters marriage.

programme.title: Lesson
programme.desc: A lady always finds herself in the wrong side of love and vows never to fall in love again, but meets a young CEO who appears different.

programme.title: Men Cry Too
programme.desc: Linda is every mans dream as she is respects him and everyone can see, their love is admired by all. How can it be that her husband is unhappy when the doors are closed.

programme.title: Heart Of Migodo
programme.desc: The heart of the silent Migodo is about to breathe again as Ugonna connection with the gods will bring peace to the kingdom.

programme.title: Second Chance
programme.desc: The Epic Channel presents a collection of epic stories that showcase the rich cultural heritage of Africa.

programme.title: Little Police
programme.desc: Azonto and Skelewu leaves their village for the city to live with their aunt. After weeks of struggling with no money, they come up with a risky hustle.

programme.title: The Village Girl I Love
programme.desc: Adugo and Benson are madly in love, but this is disrupted by Bensons mum who makes sure that she ends the relationship and propose another woman to her son.

programme.title: Vacant Throne
programme.desc: In a kingdom where sitting on the vacant throne means death, suitors flock to win Princess Ugomas hand, all seeking access to power.

programme.title: Kiekie Unscripted Experience
programme.desc: Kiekie hosts a lively talent show highlighting strength, academics, and creativity with challenges like singing, acting, balloon buster, and back-to-school tasks each episode.

programme.title: 2nd February
programme.desc: Beulah, in a race against time to save her brothers life, finds herself compelled to yield to Rexs advances, a choice that would haunt her in the days to come.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: After heartbreaks, two marketers vow never to love again, but when their paths cross, they must choose between keeping promises and giving in to the universes growing love.

programme.title: Bride Quest
programme.desc: Grace is tricked by Solomon into getting married to him, after he deceives her from breaking up with her lover. Now everything is exposed, but she decides to become a Rev. sister.

programme.title: Desire
programme.desc: Henry is surprised to discover his new personal assistant is the sexy dancer, Mercy, at the club, but he will have to prove this as Mercy shows no signs of having met him at all

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: The Rishantes
programme.desc: Kaza and Serena go on a romantic getaway, Halita takes matters into her own hands. Matilda reminds Adi of what is important. Safari finally makes some progress.

programme.title: Tinsel

programme.desc: In this slapstick comedy, an all-female police squad encounters sexism and conflicts during training, but must band together to take down a group of terrorists.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: Guan Yu is held hostage by Cao, the enemy of his sworn brother Liu, and must fight for Cao. He has to fight a dangerous battle before he can rescue Lius concubine from Cao.

programme.title: The Hidden Enforcers
programme.desc: A retired police officer trains four assassins to punish wrongdoers who escaped from conviction. However, his good intention turns sour when the assassins kill the cops.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict released from jail finds out that his wife has died and his daughter has leukemia. To encourage his daughter, he returns to the ring.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit must win a fight to get his boxing studio back but is defeated and badly hurt instead. Will he win again after witnessing the boxers spirit in his master?

programme.title: The Iron Fisted Monk
programme.desc: After learning kung fu from Shaolin, Husker teams up with the Iron Fisted Monk to fight against the Manchus who have killed villagers and raped women.

programme.title: Skinny Tiger and Fatty Dragon
programme.desc: Detective Baldy and his partner Fatty stumble upon the robbery of a jewelry store, which puts them on the trail of a triad crime syndicate.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong in 1917. When the whole school is held hostage during the day of an English speech competition, Ip Man decides to step up...

programme.title: Confession Of Pain
programme.desc: As Detective Heis father-in-law was murdered, his wife enlists the help of private detective Bong to uncover the truth, which may be linked to Hei.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover agent helps the police to solve mysterious cases, making him a rising star. However, his impulsive personality drags him into endless troubles.

programme.title: The Postman Fights Back
programme.desc: When postman Ma and three other mismatched allies deliver a secret cargo to the rebel leader, Ma finds himself on a patriotic quest to save the country and himself.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, a police officer teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Clean My Name, Mr Coroner
programme.desc: An undercover cop framed for murder is forced to take a coroner hostage so as to prove his innocence in the murder of his partner.

programme.title: The Last Blood
programme.desc: The Dalai Lama and Bees girlfriend are injured by the Red Army. Bee must find the only 3 donors with rare blood type P in 12 hours and fight against the terrorists to save them.

programme.title: The Inspector Wear Skirt II
programme.desc: In this sequel, the female police squad members struggle to blend in with the new recruits, and must also join the Special Duty Unit to capture an escaped prisoner.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster

programme.title: Iceman The Time Traveler

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran and an undercover cop lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok.

programme.title: Whampoa Blues
programme.desc: Cong and Jin are students of Whampoa Military Training School. They incidentally discover an ammunition smuggling plan and get themselves into danger...

programme.title: In Bruges

programme.title: The Last Job
programme.desc: Oscar winner Richard Dreyfuss seeks revenge on those who wronged him in this thriller. After his savings are stolen, a former mob boss returns to his old ways to find the thieves.

programme.title: Shamed
programme.desc: A delightful romcom. A magazine editor goes on an island trip to clear her mind and focus on her infamous Shamed List column, only to fall for one of the men on her List.

programme.title: Christmas Couples Retreat
programme.desc: An enjoyable Christmas movie that follows three couples who attend a retreat hoping to strengthen their respective relationships with the help of a relationship guru.

programme.title: Our Almost Completely True Story
programme.desc: A sincere and hilarious love story. A short Jewish man pursues a tall, ageing Hollywood star.

programme.title: City Of Angels
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Meg Ryan star in this romantic fantasy. An angel falls for a woman and forsakes everything and becomes human to be with her.

programme.title: Poms
programme.desc: A great ensemble cast shows that youre never too old to follow your dreams. A group of elderly women from a retirement community form a cheerleading squad and enter a competition.

programme.title: Nanny Mcphee And The Big Bang
programme.desc: Oscar winner Emma Thompson writes and stars in this fun family film. A mysterious nanny arrives to help a struggling mom with her kids and the farm while their father is at war.

programme.title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty By Nature
programme.desc: A silly adventure ensues for Surly the squirrel in this fun sequel. When the mayor of Oakton City plots to destroy their home, Surly and his friends must do all they can to stop him.

programme.title: The Misfits

programme.title: Fortress 2: Snipers Eye
programme.desc: The sequel to the action cyber thriller Fortress. Weeks after the deadly assault on Fortress Camp, Robert (Bruce Willis) makes a daring rescue to save the widow of his old nemesis.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: Liam Neeson leads this riveting film about a diamond mine that collapses in Canada. A big-rig road driver leads a rescue mission over a frozen lake to save some trapped miners.

programme.title: The Fast And The Furious
programme.desc: Vin Diesel and the late Paul Walker team up for the first instalment of the popular franchise, which sees a cop go undercover to infiltrate a racing crew.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: An ensemble cast brings the legendary comic book league to life in this superhero movie. When Earth is attacked by an alien force, Batman recruits the help of the planets mightiest heroes.

programme.title: The Unbearable Weight Of Massive...
programme.sub-title: The Unbearable Weight Of Massive Talent
programme.desc: An action comedy starring Nicolas Cage as a fictional version of himself. He channels his on-screen characters to save himself and his loved ones.

programme.title: Dead Trigger: Unkilled
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic film that sees an elite soldier unit stepping in to save humanity when a virus decimates the world and creates zombie hordes.

programme.title: Twisted Vines
programme.desc: A murder mystery that will keep you guessing. A wedding at a vineyard estate turns deadly when a body is discovered, and all the guests turn into suspects.

programme.title: The First Noelle
programme.desc: An ambitious young book editor named Noelle attempts to win back her ex after he returns home for Christmas with a new girlfriend, who also happens to be named Noelle.

programme.title: A Royal Surprise
programme.desc: Thapelo Mokoena and Jennifer Freeman are the heartbeats of this film. After Riley learns Mandla is a prince while visiting his family, he must try to regain her trust and love.

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: A mans perfect world is turned upside down when his wife leaves him. Now single, he enlists the help of a so-called ladies man to navigate the unfamiliar dating scene.

programme.title: My Sweet Monster
programme.desc: An animated musical for the family. Princess Barbara flees her wedding and meets a sweet monster and his pal, who help save her kingdom from an evil postman.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Benedict Cumberbatch leads this high-stakes Cold War spy thriller. A British businessman joins forces with a Soviet officer to defuse the Cuban Missile Crisis.

programme.title: Inception

programme.title: Jason Bourne

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious

programme.title: Miami Vice

programme.title: Black Warrant
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Tom Berenger stars in this action-packed thriller. A semi-retired assassin and DEA agent team up to stop a cyber terrorist organisation.

programme.title: Zone 414
programme.desc: Guy Pearce drives this sci-fi thriller as a private investigator tasked with finding a tech billionaires missing daughter. He teams up with an advanced AI to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Monsters Ball
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard re-examines his attitudes while falling in love with the African-American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

programme.title: Death Race
